text: @NYGovCuomo And let’s apply that plan to #prisons and #jails too - test all correctional staff twice a week. A critically needed #publichealth step to understanding and mitigating COVID19 spread throughout the US. @ASlavitt @VanJones68 @AmendatUCSF
